definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: only 2 t.: [[עָרְֶָ]] 1Sa 28:16 (v. Dr.); rd. [[חָרְֶָ]] thine adversary Klo HPS (al. as altern. with foll.) > [[עִם רֵעְֶָ]] LXX SyrVer Targum Th Bu Kit (?) al.; [[עָרֶיְ]] Ps 139:20 is very dub.; Hup [[עָלֶיְ]], Ol Che al. [[שְׁמְֶָ]]; Bae leaves untranslated.
